title: Mischa Bredewold Upstages Favorites with Coming-of-Age Amstel Gold Race Victory
content:
Home success for former European champion Bredewold in punchy race, with well-timed attacks in finale securing career-best victory.

Read the full article at Mischa Bredewold Upstages Favorites with Coming-of-Age Amstel Gold Race Victory on Velo.
author: sstokes
